column4: can someone help me with this problem?...I think I changed some setting that now everytime I use a programs open dialog box it shows the hidden files in my home directory but it doesn't do it in nautilis. I want to know how to turn it off

I FEEL IGNORED!!!! can someone help me with this problem?...I think I changed some setting that now everytime I use a programs open dialog box it shows the hidden files in my home directory but it doesn't do it in nautilis. I want to know how to turn it off
can't you just right click in the dialog box ?
